sources.title: Legend of the Lost (1957)
sources.description: American ne'er-do-well Joe January is hired to take Paul Bonnard on an expedition into the desert in search of treasure. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/legend-of-the-lost-1957/

metadata.Plot: Paul Bonnard arrives in Timbuktu in search of a guide to escort him into the Sahara desert. American Joe January takes the job despite misgivings about Bonnard's plans. Dita, a prostitute who has been deeply moved by what appears to be Bonnard's spiritual nature, follows the two men into the desert. Eventually the trio arrives in the ruins of a lost city, where Bonnard hopes to find the treasure his father sought years earlier before disappearing. But what Bonnard finds alters him in unexpected ways, with tragic results.
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Sophia Loren, Rossano Brazzi
